    • com.soen6441.ui.common中View的使用

      com.soen6441.ui.common中View的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  GridView
      This class defines the GridView, the main grid which is displayed on the view.
      class  GridViewCell
      This class defines a unit of the GridView, a cell on the GridView.
      class  InspectorView
      This class defines the inspector view.

    • com.soen6441.ui.map中View的使用

      com.soen6441.ui.map中View的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明

      This class defines a unit of the mapView, our model where our grid resigns.
      class  MapItemView 
      class  MapView
      This class defines the view of the map.

    • com.soen6441.ui.scene中View的使用

      com.soen6441.ui.scene中View的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  EditingScene
      This class is the Editing scene class where the user edits a created or new map.
      class  MainScene
      This class defines the mainscene.
      class  NewMapScene
      This class is used to create the weight and height of a new map, and with two buttons that the abilities are go to next page or back to last page.
      class  PlayingScene
      this is PlayingScene class is responsible of the playscene view and showing the corresponding information of the related models not finish with the inner classes
